message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

This paper deals with reinforcement learning in the context of robust Markov decision processes (RMDPs), which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper proposes a new algorithm for RMDPs that involves exploration and adaptation, which are key components of robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses Bayesian methods to address the learning problem, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.MA).
